Events

We encourage you to attend this events:

  • Monday, October 29, from 3-4:30 p.m. Data Visualization with Tableau Place: Digital Scholars’ Lab, Learning Commons

November 2018

  • Friday, November 2, from 10-11:30 a.m. Research Data Description and Documentation Place: Flexible Program Space, Learning Commons

  • Thrusday-Friday, Nov. 29-30: Tapestry Conference: Storytelling is the mos powerful way to put ideas into the world today

  • Friday, November 30, from 2-4:30 p.m. Utilizing GIS Data Workshop Series: Developing Conservation Strategies for Florida’s Forests Place: Digital Scholars’ Lab, Learning Commons
